channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2025021294
item.description:
Report X-2025021294

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-24
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO DOOR 3 IN THE UNLOAD WEARING FULL PPE. THE PACKAGE WAS AT THE FRONT OF THE TRAILER LEAKING. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AND RETURNED TO DMP AND PROCESSED LEAKINNG PACKAGE.
